entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
